phrases: These are the Jo brothers from room 201.
He is a third-year business school student.
Shindo's written with the characters for god and child.
Back there is Sakaguchi Yohei of room 205.
Like me, he is a fourth-year.
He is the king of trivia.
I cannot be held responsible for anything that happens.
That is Kashiwazaki Akane of room 204.
He is a second-year literature student.
That is Hirata Akihiro from room 104.
He is a third-year science and engineering student.
How many times do I have to say it?
He was a year above me when I first met him,
but now he is a year behind me.
If I sue, there is a 100 percent chance I will win.
This is Iwakura Yukihiko from room 102.
He is a fourth-year law student who passed the bar on his first try.
This is the landlord, Mr. Tazaki.
This is Musa Kamara, a foreign student.
He is a second-year science and engineering student.
Let me know when you are out of the bath.
I have heard that name before.
You should listen to your department's seniors!
You guys have the biggest room.
There is two of us in one room.
But I was about to finish.
Since Haiji made it, it is all country cooking.
Oh, you do not have to tell us.
A toast to our tenth resident!
It is no exaggeration to say it will completely change your college life.
Let us borrow that comic, then.
Why cannot I wear my jacket?
You would stand out as the only one.
Do I really need a suit?
No one wears jeans when they are looking for a job.
King, what did you do for your coming-of-age ceremony?
Did your high school uniform include a blazer?
You are not telling me to wear that, are you?
We ran into each other on the street.
You are Haiji's long-awaited tenth man.
We were worried about who would show up.
We figured he would bring someone ridiculous.
I am glad you seem decent.
What are you discussing with the newbie?
We are discussing how to tell you two apart.
Get this question right, and you will win a can of beer.
Why did you answer the question?
You think I would not answer a quiz question?
Why did you have to find that, Shindo?
I knew I felt a breeze.
Haiji, they made a hole in the floor.
It is only been ten days since they moved in.
Just cover it up with a magazine.
Do not let the landlord find out.
I know the party's in full swing, but lend me your ears.
Since Kurahara moved in, there are finally ten of us.
I have not decided to move in yet.
There are exactly ten of us.
You have been saying that ever since the twins moved in.
Just one more, just one more...
You must be glad we filled the last room surprisingly quickly.
It is not enough to just think about it.
You should always state your wishes out loud.
You have got to seize your own destiny.
I do not know what you are talking about,
but why do not we take a trip somewhere to celebrate reaching ten?
We can stay at an inn and drink sake.
That is not any different from right now.
They have got hot springs, and it is easy to get there.
Should we take the train or rent a car?
We will not take a vehicle.
We will use our legs to get around.
Let us aim for the top together.
Everyone is seen it at least once on New Year's while eating rice-cake soup.
You still only get in for a second, Haiji.
It is been three years, but I still cannot get used to the heat.
So you are a fourth-year now, huh?
Your first and final chance must have arrived, right?
Well, the new students will be coming soon.
I am sure you will find someone.
Your first and final chance must have arrived, right?
Do not suddenly stop like that.
I will not call the cops.
I just want to know who you are.
I am Kiyose Haiji, a fourth-year literature student at Kansei University.
No, uh... I am at Kansei University.
You are a Kansei University student?
I definitely cannot ignore you if you are an underclassman!
I lost my entire apartment deposit at a mah-jong parlor.
I will show you the apartment where I live.
But I do not have any money.
You can pay when you can.
We will start with the convenience store.
We will go see him later.
I will get you a futon tomorrow, so you will have to make do with my blanket tonight.
I will introduce you to the guys.
That is the sign out front.
Kansei University Track and Field Club
Kansei University Track and Field Club...
Does this degradation look recent to you?
It was so dirty, we could not read it.
Is not it a relay race?
This is the Kansei University Track and Field Club member dorm.
you are now members of the Kansei University Track and Field Club.
I never signed up for that!
Moving in here signs you up for the club.
Did not you find it strange that in this day and age
the rent's 30,000 yen, and we serve breakfast and dinner?
How did you not know about this?
Have not you been living here longer than Haiji?
But the old man never told me anything.
I cannot believe my first job after passing the bar will be my own civil trial.
Do not bother trying to sue me.
Your rental application is your club application.
Are we registered with the Inter-University Athletic Union of Kanto?
The landlord was known as the treasure of the Japan Association of Athletics.
By the time Tsuburaya Kokichi wrote his food-based suicide note and died,
the landlord was already considered Kansei University's great coach.
There is no trace of his incredible nature left.
You sure know a lot about him, newbie.
He must mean the Kanto Gogakuren from Otokojuku.
With over a thousand members, they are led by Date Omito.
I do not think that is right.
No one knows that for sure.
So do I, while taking Nira for his walk.
Before you ask, I will tell you.
I am almost back at full speed.
In six months, I will be able to match your pace.
I am going to run in the Hakone Ekiden.
Starting today, I am going to win over all the guys.
